Explanations about Options.-a:
Show both listening and non-listening sockets. With the --interfaces option, show
 interfaces that are not up
Explanations about Options.-p: Show the PID and name of the program to which each socket belongs.
Explanations about Options.-o: Include information related to networking timers.
Explanations about Options.-l: Show only listening sockets. (These are omitted by default.)
Explanations about Options.-n: Show numerical addresses instead of trying to determine symbolic host, port or user names.
